page.title: 17JEWISH YOUTH GROUPS
page.content: {Ezra}is a Jewish group for boys and girls of different ages which meets on Saturday afternoons and other ocassions. They have a wide variety of outings ranging from hikes to having a football match. In the summer holidays they arrange a camp for two weeks. They are very original with their ideas for team competitions. One Saturday night there was a peanut hunt and another day orienteering. They have an outdoor swimming pool most years and tennis courts, not to mention snooker and table-tennis tables. { Pirchim,}just like Ezra, is run by the Aguda. They meet for an hour on Saturday afternoons and learn the Bible. On other days there are outings for instance going on hikes and seeing how a post-office is run. Written by Michael Kritzler 10yrs.
